# IDistributionContract
[Git Source](https://github.com/Uniswap/twap-auction/blob/f4ca3ef3995c04dfc87924fa2a7301b4b6eb60a2/src/interfaces/external/IDistributionContract.sol)

Interface for token distribution contracts.


## Functions
### onTokensReceived

Notify a distribution contract that it has received the tokens to distribute


```solidity
function onTokensReceived() external;
```
